    • validate

      @PostMapping public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome validate(@RequestBody org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Bundle bundle, @RequestParam(defaultValue="INFORMATION") org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome.IssueSeverity severity)
      Validates a Bundle provided in the request body
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      severity - The minimum severity level to report on
      Returns:
      Returns an OperationOutcome resource that provides details about each of the issues found

    • getValidationIssuesForReport

      @GetMapping("/{tenantId}/{reportId}") public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome getValidationIssuesForReport(@PathVariable String tenantId, @PathVariable String reportId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="INFORMATION") org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome.IssueSeverity severity, @RequestParam(required=false) String code)
      Gets the validation results for a stored report
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      reportId - The id of the report to validate against
      severity - The minimum severity level to report on
      Returns:
      Returns an OperationOutcome resource that provides details about each of the issues found
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getValidationSummary

      @GetMapping("/{tenantId}/{reportId}/summary") public String getValidationSummary(@PathVariable String tenantId, @PathVariable String reportId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="INFORMATION") org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome.IssueSeverity severity, @RequestParam(required=false) String code)
      Provides a summary of unique messages from validation results
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      reportId - The id of the report to validate against
      severity - The minimum severity level to report on
      Returns:
      Returns a plain string, each line representing a single message (including severity)
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getValidationForCustomCategories

      @PostMapping("/{tenantId}/{reportId}/category") public List<ValidationCategoryResponse> getValidationForCustomCategories(@PathVariable String tenantId, @PathVariable String reportId, @RequestBody List<RuleBasedValidationCategory> categories)
      Retrieves the validation categories for a report, for a custom set of categories
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      reportId - The id of the report to validate against
      Returns:
      Returns a list of ValidationCategoryResponse objects
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

    • getValidationForCustomCategory

      @PostMapping("/{tenantId}/{reportId}/category/{categoryId}") public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome getValidationForCustomCategory(@PathVariable String tenantId, @PathVariable String reportId, @PathVariable String categoryId, @RequestBody List<RuleBasedValidationCategory> categories)
      Retrieves the validation results for a report, for a custom set of categories, for a specific category. This is used to test that construction of validation categorizes against a given report and see how well the categories work against the validation results before committing the validation categories.
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      reportId - The id of the report to validate against
      categoryId - The id of the category to retrieve results for
      Returns:
      Returns a list of ValidationCategoryResponse objects
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

    • getValidationCategories

      @GetMapping("/{tenantId}/{reportId}/category") public List<ValidationCategoryResponse> getValidationCategories(@PathVariable String tenantId, @PathVariable String reportId) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Retrieves the validation categories for a report
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      reportId - The id of the report to validate against
      Returns:
      Returns a list of ValidationCategoryResponse objects
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

    • getUncategorizedValidationResults

      @GetMapping("/{tenantId}/{reportId}/category/uncategorized") public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome getUncategorizedValidationResults(@PathVariable String tenantId, @PathVariable String reportId)
      Retrieves the validation results for a report that are not categorized
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      reportId - The id of the report to validate against
      Returns:
      Returns an OperationOutcome resource that provides details about each of the issues found

    • validate

      @PostMapping("/{tenantId}/{reportId}") public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome validate(@PathVariable String tenantId, @PathVariable String reportId)
      Re-validates a generated report and persists the validation results. Always validates at INFORMATION severity level.
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      reportId - The id of the report to validate against
      Returns:
      Returns an OperationOutcome resource that provides details about each of the issues found
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getValidationCategoryResults

      @GetMapping("/{tenantId}/{reportId}/category/{categoryId}") public org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.OperationOutcome getValidationCategoryResults(@PathVariable String tenantId, @PathVariable String reportId, @PathVariable String categoryId)
      Retrieves the validation results for a report that are categorized
      Parameters:
      tenantId - The id of the tenant
      reportId - The id of the report to validate against
      categoryId - The id of the category to retrieve results for
      Returns:
      Returns an OperationOutcome resource that provides details about each of the issues found
